author: dildick
body:
#### PR description:

Minor change to fix the ME1/a LCT global position. ME1/a LCTs have half-strip numbers 128 to 227, so 128 needs to be subtracted before the function `intersectionOfStripAndWire` can be used.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles and was tested on CMSSW_11_2_X relvals.
